name: Niko and the Cubic Curse
description:
Niko and the Cubic Curse is a hand drawn 2D Platformer created by indie developer Josh Rieg!



What Can You Expect When You Buy Niko and the Cubic Curse:

- 6 Worlds with over 30 levels
- Over 100 different collectibles
- Unique boss fights
- Incredibly cute and uniquely designed characters and NPC's
- Original OST

Play as Niko and help him uncover the mystery of everyone's new shape-like appearances!
